title: Qanect Company Website by Asen Sokolov
descr: Web developer based in Dubai, UAE. With more than 8 year experience and more than 100 project behind his back as a part of Xec-studio family.

generalInfo:
Qanect is a full service marketing and communications consultancy, with expertise in brand strategy, marketing, communications, design, public relations, digital and event management. Since 2011, the company has achieved a lot in a relatively young life, evolving to help businesses realise the potential of their most valuable asset – their brand.

Qanect winning combination of strategic planning, creativity and technology enables us to deliver original ideas, tangible business opportunities, sales acceleration and growth, communication infrastructures and compelling brand experiences for our clients.
typographyDescr: Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop an interactive, modern, clean and user friendly company website.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: With attention to detail we’ve designed more than 10 main and over 20 internal pages. The website has been optimised for great speed performance and mobile usage. We also added many cool features like a custom made page for Job Applications and awesome Portfolio Page dedicated to Qanect’s Best projects.

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: XEC-Studio
